name: Layer
description:
Overconsumption has turned the world into a gigantic dumping ground. Travel through a ruined city and let yourself be surprised by a captivating atmosphere charged with CO2. Take a walk through the waste and face your fears of ecological disaster.

Made in five days by nine Game Developers during their 3rd and 4th year at ISART Digital. Layer is a light-horror game project where you discover a world destroyed by the overconsumption. 

Credits:

Game Artists:

  • Roman AGÉNOR
  • Kévin RAKOTOMALA
  • Typhaine BRUNET
  • Ange MALAURIE

Game Designers:

  • Séverine KRANTZ
  • Louis-Marie KERBERENES

Sound Designer:

  • Benoit LAURY-BRACHET

Game Programmers:

  • Benjamin MARIN
  • Rémi GINER
